thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Pamela Mongiello
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Pamela Mongiello

author: Pamela Mongiello
title: Pamela Mongiello
text: I've used CRV (Robin Sabine) twice and have referred several other travelers as well. Robin is patient and listens to what you want and will create a package just for you. I like to do a lot of research myself so Robin and I worked together to come up with perfect itineraries. I can't wait for my next trip to Costa Rica--and I will definitely be booking it with Robin Sabine and CRV.
